summary: Completed testing of deepfake detection website iteration 3 with focus on Arabic language support, improved AI accuracy, and new innovative features (analysis pipeline, confidence gauge, forensic notes)

ui_bugs.issue: Authentication token appears to expire quickly, redirecting user back to login during testing

integration_issues.issue: Could not complete full file upload and analysis workflow due to testing environment limitations (PIL module missing)

passed_tests: Backend: All 12 API endpoints returning 200 status
Backend: Arabic language support - responses contain Arabic characters
Backend: English language support - responses in English
Backend: New iteration 3 fields present (analysis_stages, forensic_notes, format_info, quality_assessment)
Backend: PDF report generation working for both Arabic and English
Frontend: Dashboard displays with correct statistics (7 analyses, proper breakdown)
Frontend: Navigation menu working (Dashboard, Analyze, History, Compare)
Frontend: Analyze page with upload dropzone interface
Frontend: Language toggle button present (EN visible)
Frontend: Professional UI design with proper styling

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All APIs functional with new features
success_percentage.frontend: 70% - Core UI working, some session/testing environment issues

action_item_for_main_agent: Frontend session management needs review - authentication tokens appear to expire quickly during user sessions. Consider increasing token lifetime or implementing proper token refresh mechanism. Testing environment may need PIL/Pillow module for complete e2e testing.
